name: Clean, comfy single room@0
description:
Welcome to stay in our newly-renovated, fully-furnished, fully-equipped space. Our house is located in a very safe area only 0.1 mile to Maverick T stop which takes you to downtown financial district or airport in less than 5mins, Fenway, Boston Convention Center or Cambridge in around 20mins; great neighborhood, 2mins walk to amazing Boston waterfront, bike sharing around the corner!!
Enjoy your own private clean and comfortable room!

The space
Pros: clean, comfy, conveniently located, easy address to public transport. Cons: this particular room is a single room with one queen size bed (smaller than usual size room) and it is located at ground floor which may get noise from the street.

Guest access
You'll have your own private room with lock and share bathrooms, kitchen and sitting room with other guests.

Other things to note
My little dog stays with me in the house.

License number
STR-39
